title: Bouncing straight to Bug screen when the game is trying to load in to a game after charter select!!
body:
Hi Guys my game for the last 2 days has been bouncing me straight back out with a bug report screen soon as it trys to load in to a game after the charter select, so what happens is, once charter selection it's done it will try and load in to the game like normal but after the black load screen for around 2 to 3 sec it will bounce me back out to the client with reconnect and bug report screen.

I have never had this before for the 5 yr I have been playing lol and it was still running fine 2 days ago, I did not make any update to my windows the game or anything!

Iam running windows 10 with m980gtx on alienware 17, tested other 3d games, runs fine!
I have updated to latest driver and reinstalled the whole game, also try repair 

Please help, thanks!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?

* Are you sure your [system is up to date](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq4)?
* Have you tried [reinstalling the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)?
